item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, November 21, 2024 at 10:15 PM UTC
item.description:

26. January 1928: Dirac equation unifies quantum mechanics and special relativity (91 points | 53 comments)

29. Doxx/Darkflare: DarkFlare TCPoCDN (TCP over CDN) (145 points | 26 comments)
